content.question: The facade of the Temple of Minerva includes which of the following architectural features?

choices.label: A portico flanked by Corinthian columns
A pediment supported by Tuscan columns

content.answer: A pediment supported by Tuscan columns

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
